Create a project laid out for producing training materials

Source: R/createTrainingProject.R
createTrainingProject.Rd

Create a project laid out for producing training materials

createTrainingProject(name, dirs = c("data", "handouts", "slides"),
  handoutEngine = "rmarkdown", slideEngine = "rmarkdown", ...)

Arguments

name

Project
dirs

Directories to create
handoutEngine

Package for building handouts
slideEngine

Package for building slides
...

Pass to createBasicProject()

Examples

# NOT RUN {
proj<-"trainingproj"
createTrainingProject(proj)
list.files(proj)
unlink(proj)
# }

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples
